verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>"Take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6635>service<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> [concerning] the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things.<s%>

"When the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H5265>sets<s%> out, <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in and they shall <S%H3381>take<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>screen<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> with it;

and they shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> a <S%H3681>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skin<s%> on it, and shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> [it] a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H3632>pure<s%> <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and shall <S%H7760>insert<s%> its <S%H905>poles.<s%>

<S%H5921>"Over<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of the bread of the <S%H6440>Presence<s%> they shall also <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> on it the <S%H7086>dishes<s%> and the <S%H3709>pans<s%> and the <S%H4518>sacrificial<s%> <S%H4518>bowls<s%> and the <S%H7184>jars<s%> for the <S%H5262>libation,<s%> and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be on it.

"And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> [material,] and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H853>same<s%> with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and they shall <S%H7760>insert<s%> its <S%H905>poles.<s%>

"Then they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> along with its <S%H5216>lamps<s%> and its <S%H4457>snuffers,<s%> and its <S%H4289>trays<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>serve<s%> it;

and they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils<s%> in a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H4132>carrying<s%> <S%H4132>bars.<s%>

"And <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and shall <S%H7760>insert<s%> its <S%H905>poles;<s%>

and they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of <S%H8335>service,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>serve<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> them with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H4132>carrying<s%> <S%H4132>bars.<s%>
"Then they shall <S%H1878>take<s%> <S%H1878>away<s%> the <S%H1878>ashes<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it.

"They shall also <S%H5414>put<s%> on it <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>serve<s%> in <S%H5921>connection<s%> with it: the <S%H4289>firepans,<s%> the <S%H9254>forks<s%> and <S%H3257>shovels<s%> and the <S%H4219>basins,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H3681>cover<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it and <S%H7760>insert<s%> its <S%H905>poles.<s%>

"And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H3680>covering<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [objects] and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> when the <S%H4264>camp<s%> is to <S%H5265>set<s%> out, <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> [them,] so that they may not <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [objects] and <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4853>things<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> which the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> are to <S%H4853>carry.<s%>

"And the <S%H6486>responsibility<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%> and the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> â€“ the <S%H6486>responsibility<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it, with the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and its <S%H3627>furnishings.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"Do not let the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

"But <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> to them that they may <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H4191>die<s%> when they <S%H5066>approach<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> [objects: ] <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H7760>assign<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of them to his <S%H5656>work<s%> and to his <S%H4853>load;<s%>
but they shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> [objects] even for a <S%H1104>moment,<s%> lest they <S%H4191>die.<s%> "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H5375>"Take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> you shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them; <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H935>enter<s%> to <S%H6633>perform<s%> the <S%H6635>service<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> in <S%H5647>serving<s%> and in carrying: <S%H4853><s%>

they shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> [with] its <S%H4372>covering<s%> and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H8476>skin<s%> that is on <S%H4605>top<s%> of it, and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%>

and the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and the <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>equipment<s%> for their <S%H5656>service;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> they shall <S%H5647>perform.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4853>loads<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>work,<s%> shall be [performed] at the <S%H6310>command<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and you shall <S%H6485>assign<s%> to them as a <S%H4931>duty<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4853>loads.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and their <S%H4931>duties<s%> [shall be] under the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
"[As for] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> you shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households;<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> you shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them, <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H935>enters<s%> the <S%H6635>service<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of their <S%H4853>loads,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting:<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and its <S%H1280>bars<s%> and its <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and its <S%H134>sockets,<s%>

and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> and their <S%H3489>pegs<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3627>equipment<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service;<s%> and you shall <S%H6485>assign<s%> [each man] by <S%H8034>name<s%> the <S%H3627>items<s%> he is to <S%H4853>carry.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> under the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H6635>service<s%> for <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
And their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men by their <S%H4940>families<s%> were 2750.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H6956>Kohathite<s%> <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who was <S%H5647>serving<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H6635>service<s%> for <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
And their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> were 2630.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who was <S%H5647>serving<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
And the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H6635>service<s%> for <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
And their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men by their <S%H4940>families<s%> were 3200.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%> and by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%>

from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who could <S%H935>enter<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5647>work<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> and the <S%H5656>work<s%> of <S%H4853>carrying<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
And their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men were 8580.

<S%H5921>According<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> they were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> by his <S%H5656>serving<s%> or <S%H4853>carrying;<s%> thus these were his <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, <S%H834>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
